MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-DEC-2020 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich affecting properties in Main Road , Chapel Street and the surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are still working to restore power for those customers still off supply. In order to complete repairs on the underground cable network, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect all power to be restored by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:58pm on the 31st December 2020.
